ml.alternet.parser.visit

Interface TraversableRule.SimpleRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComposedRule<Grammar.Rule>, TraversableRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Grammar.AtLeast, Grammar.AtMost, Grammar.Bounds, Grammar.DropToken, Grammar.Optional, Grammar.Proxy, Grammar.Proxy.Deferred, Grammar.Proxy.Named, Grammar.Repeatable, Grammar.TypedToken, Grammar.TypedToken.Mapper, Grammar.TypedToken.Number, Grammar.TypedToken.String, Grammar.TypedToken.TypedNumber, Grammar.Wrapper, Grammar.ZeroOrMore
    Enclosing interface:
    TraversableRule

    public static interface TraversableRule.SimpleRule
extends TraversableRule, ComposedRule<Grammar.Rule>
    Allow to traverse the nested rule embedded in this rule. This interface can be used only by subclasses of Rule.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ml.alternet.parser.visit.TraversableRule

      • accept

        default void accept(Visitor visitor)
        Description copied from interface: TraversableRule
        Accept the given visitor. The visitor hold the state during traversing and is responsible of avoiding infinite loop during recursion.
